response.overview: Vintage film footage, family photos, and personal recollections reveal the unheralded story of the largest ethnic group in the United States -- one in five Americans is of German ancestry. Families who left the Heimatland in search of opportunity set the stage for America's early economic growth as stewards of the land, unyielding laborers, and leaders in every major industry. The German Americans explores the immigrant experience and celebrates the cultural ties that still bond generations after 400 years in the United States.
response.title: The German Americans
